name: champion-council
description: Local AI model orchestrator with 140+ MCP tools. Manage HuggingFace models, semantic memory, workflows, and developer collaboration.

commands.title: Champion: Generate MCP Config for IDE

champion.capsulePath.description: Path to champion_gen8.py (leave empty to use bundled copy)

champion.mcpPort.description: MCP server port for HTTP/SSE transport

champion.autoStartMCP.description: Automatically start MCP server on extension activation

champion.tools.coreInference.description: Enable core inference tools (5 tools: forward, infer, embed, deliberate, imagine)

champion.tools.chat.description: Enable chat and conversation tools (3 tools)

champion.tools.batch.description: Enable batch processing tools (5 tools: batch forward, embed, pipe, compare)

champion.tools.councilSlots.description: Enable council slot management tools (12 tools: plug, unplug, list, rename, swap)

champion.tools.council.description: Enable council operation tools (7 tools: broadcast, consensus, debate, chain)

champion.tools.felixbag.description: Enable semantic memory tools (12 tools: get, put, search, catalog, export)

champion.tools.huggingface.description: Enable HuggingFace Hub tools (8 tools: search, info, download, browse)

champion.tools.llm.description: Enable LLM operation tools (3 tools: generate, classify, rerank)

champion.tools.vastai.description: Enable Vast.AI GPU rental tools (13 tools, requires VAST_API_KEY)

champion.tools.replication.description: Enable model snapshot and variant tools (5 tools)

champion.tools.export.description: Enable export and documentation tools (8 tools: config, docs, PyTorch, ONNX)

champion.tools.visualization.description: Enable visualization tools (5 tools, requires rerun-sdk)

champion.tools.status.description: Enable status and introspection tools (20 tools: status, capabilities, weights, dims)

champion.tools.diagnostics.description: Enable diagnostic tools (6 tools: file analysis, root cause tracing, metrics)

champion.tools.apiServer.description: Enable API server and relay tools (6 tools)

champion.tools.security.description: Enable safety state management tools (3 tools: freeze, resume, check)

champion.tools.workflows.description: Enable workflow automation tools (9 tools: create, execute, list, history)

champion.tools.advanced.description: Enable advanced tools (5 tools: universal call, observe, slot state)

champion.tools.cascade.description: Enable observability tools (7 tools: causation graph, provenance chain, data, system)

champion.tools.cache.description: Enable cache management tools (2 tools: get cached, clear cache)

champion.nostrEnabled.description: Enable Nostr-based community features (workflow marketplace, live chat)

champion.nostrRelays.description: Community relay URLs (see extension docs for defaults)

champion.communityChat.description: Enable public chat in the Community tab

champion.communityMarketplace.description: Enable workflow marketplace browsing and publishing

champion.communityAutoRedact.description: Auto-redact API keys, passwords, emails, file paths, IPs, and other sensitive data before sending messages

champion.communityPresence.description: Share online presence with other community members

champion.evaluation.enabled.description: Track inference quality per model and council combination

champion.evaluation.autoRecord.description: Automatically record inference metrics for tracked tools

champion.ipfs.provider.description: IPFS pinning provider for persisting CIDs (requires API key)

champion.ipfs.apiKey.description: API key or JWT for the selected IPFS pinning provider

champion.ipfs.gateway.description: Custom IPFS gateway URL (leave empty for provider default)

champion.memory.gistPublish.description: Enable 'Publish to Gist' on FelixBag memory items. Requires GitHub authentication. When disabled, only local versioning is available.

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
